alert.note: Alert for Fulton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 1:01PM EST until March 11 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky...Missouri... Mississippi River at New Madrid. .The river will continue a slow fall, and is expected to fall below flood stage at New Madrid Thursday night. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at New Madrid. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 34.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Thursday evening and continue falling. - Flood stage is 34.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
